actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to permit retired personnel of the Armed Forces to receive benefits under chapter 81 to title 5, United States Code, relating to compensation of Federal

summary.text: Makes retired personnel of the Armed Forces eligible to receive Civil Service benefits and compensation for work injuries. ((Amends 5 U.S.C. 8116(a)(2))
